snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U814 : SNORA25 SNORA77. 2009年6月18日（山元）snoRNABaseより。Homo sapiens ACA63 snoRNA. This H/ACA box RNA was characterized by bioinformatics, and its expression verified by Northern blot and primer extension in mouse (Schattner et al., 2006). ACA63 is a primate-specific Type 3 snoRT. The parental copy, ACA63B, resides in the RANBP1 gene from human to chicken and fishes (Weber, 2006; Luo and Li, 2007). (20100630末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Schattner, P., Barberan-Soler, S., and Lowe, T. M. (2006). A computational screen for mammalian pseudouridylation guide H/ACA RNAs. Rna 12, 15-25, Weber MJ. (2006) Mammalian Small Nucleolar RNAs Are Mobile Genetic Elements. PLoS Genet. 2(12):e205, Luo Y. and Li S. (2007) Genome-wide analyses of retrogenes derived from the human box H/ACA snoRNAs. Nuc. Acids Res. 35(2):559-71.
